code: const BASE_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL;export async function apiFetch(endpoint){let options=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:{};const url=`${BASE_URL}${endpoint}`;const response=await fetch(url,options);if(!response.ok){throw new Error(`Error en la petición a ${url}: ${response.statusText}`);}return response.json();}
